entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ARM64 unwinder missing support for pac_sign_lr #90500
  • [mono] Tests `System.IO.Hashing.Tests.Crc32Tests` crashing on tvos-arm64 #90499
    8.0.0
  • .net 7.0 perf regression with stopwatch #90498
  • [mono] Tests failing `System.Globalization.Calendars.IOS.Tests` on ios-like platforms #90497
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Many libraries tests failing due to `The type initializer for 'DynamicDelegateLightup' threw an exception` on tvos-arm64 #90494
    8.0.0
  • Allocation for a simple isinst pattern in Tier0 #90492
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SocketOptionNameTest.MulticastInterface_Set_IPv6_XXXXX_Succeeds failing #90491
  • AggressiveOptimization is reported as Tier1 #90490
    9.0.0
  • CLR crashing when running RemoteExecutor tests locally on Debug builds #90485
  • [Feature Proposal]: Provide the infrastructure to ease proxying the call to an object #90483
  • [WASI] wasiconsole template: Instructions in generated README.md incorrect #90482
  • something like initial JVM heap size need for GC heap size in dotnet #90481
  • [API Proposal]: `Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder` without parameter API #90479
  • [API Proposal]: Add `ConfigureHostOptions` extensions for `IHostApplicationBuilder` #90478
  • Question: xml escape/unescape characters #90477
  • JsonNode.GetPropertyName/GetElementIndex exception message misleading #90474
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe shutdown and EventPipeEventDispatcher aren't coordinated properly #90472
    9.0.0

Closed

  • System.NotImplementedException in ComWrappers.TryGetOrCreateObjectForComInstanceInternal on NativeAOT #89713
  • NativeAOT ComWrappers: support IReferenceTrackerHost #85137
    9.0.0
  • Tests.System.TimeProviderTests.TestProviderTimer test failure #87477
    8.0.0
  • Unhandled Exception in Pipeline Execution Thread,Exception #59460
    Future
  • System.Math.Pow does not return the correct answer if x is negative and y is 0 #90475
  • [browser][MT] legacy JS interop needs GC boundaries on main thread too #90044
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf failure with ` Compiling function #5058 failed: not enough arguments on the stack for i64.extend_i32_u (need 1, got 0) ` #82608
    8.0.0
  • [Wasm][AOT] Using Array.Sort falls back to the interpreter #81403
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][AOT] emcc : error - received SIGKILL (-9) #89402
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml`, and `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly` tests breaking for AOT on rolling builds #85013
    8.0.0
  • Bad performance with Blazor WebAssembly even when using AOT compilation #69797
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize is intolerably slow in Blazor WebAssembly, but very fast in .NET Core integration test #40386
    8.0.0
  • [wasi/wasm] dotnet workload search output has placeholder text in en-US.utf-8 locale #90207
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Review all Task Warnings and Errors for correctness and clarity #53627
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] icu.dat file size increase - SoD Regressions in New Blazor Template - Publish and Pizza App - Publish #57294
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • HttpClientFactory stop cleanup timer on dispose #90503
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [mono][arm64] Fixed passing/receiving hfa structures with fixed buffers. #90502
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix VersionWithType Crossgen2 check for parameterized types #90501
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Handle side-effects in impBoxPatternMatch #90496
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make TimeProvider Delay Continuations Synchronously #90489
    needs-area-label
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #90488
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve debugging of HttpRequestOptions #90487
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Improve error message in the new `JsonNode.GetElementIndex()` and `GetPropertyName()` methods. #90486
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Cache the output of `mono-aot-cross --print-icall-table` #90476
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Natvis visualization for threadstatic variables. #90473
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Enable nullable on Hosting.Systemd #90495
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fixing COM Aggregation and XAML reference tracking on .NET AOT #90283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix TimeProvider Test #90448
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Integrate keyed DI with HttpClientFactory #90272
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Enumerable.ToArray performance improvement using InlineArray #90459
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [Mono][WIP] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Annotate System.Linq.Expressions with RequiresDynamicCode #90456
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • [wasm] Incremental build improvements #90194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Symbolicate function names on debug callstack #90348
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser
  • [wasm] Respect `AppendRuntimeIdentifierToOutputPath`, and `UseArtifactsOutput` #90365
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Fix Vector<T>.IsSupported intrinsic #90023
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [MonoVM] Change how toggle refs are reported in gcdump #90467
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add NonGC documentation #90206
    needs-area-label
  • [ARM64] Use SHRN in SpanHelpers.CountValueType #89632
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Remove AggressiveOpt from CastHelpers.LdelemaRef/StelemRef #90412
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #90053
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.0
  • Support invoke of function pointer type arg #90270
    area-System.Reflection
  • Align V512 reads in IndexOf. #90177
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Use non-generic `Memmove` for pointers in `String` #90383
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add `WidenLatin1ToUtf16_MisalignedAddress` #90319
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unspill normalize-on-load variables using exact small type #90318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
